summary: PHP SDK needs to encode failures using EncodedAttributes to pass the Harness test. The failure message should be encoded and stack trace should be empty.
userImpact: Failures in PHP SDK workflows will not be properly encoded, causing test failures and potential interoperability issues with other SDKs.
rootCause: PHP SDK does not currently encode failures using EncodedAttributes as required by the Harness test specification.
proposedFix: Implement failure encoding using EncodedAttributes so that Failure.message contains the encoded failure and Failure.stack_trace is empty.
keyQuote: Failure.message should be "Encoded failure" and Failure.stack_trace should be "".
